content.detailedDescription: Just read the info posted by someone in carlsbad-same date. he/she could not have explained it more accurately than i could! it was the exact same sighting! appeared, then disappeared only to appear again for a few seconds more. then disappeared completely. planes nearby. no clouds or fog! could see allnthe stars! standing in parking lot at dana point harbor. object was flying west into the direction of the ocean. the description was the exact same thing we saw. any info anyone??
content.summary: Bright dot with arc like flare on both sides of it following behind

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke  and looked up and seen 2 bright lights  they just appeared out of nowhere  and i watched them for a few mins  then one  started  traveling away then shortly then next one  went the same way.  then a few mins  later  a light blinked  then went away  in a different location.  this is not the first time i have seen 2 lights  together do this  around here. i know what i saw  i watch the night sky all the time
content.summary: 2 star light object

content.detailedDescription:
This was called in to mufon and was given to debbie ziegelmeyer mo. s.D. 
the witness was looking out the window and saw the object move slowly across the sky, stop, reverse direction and move away very very fast. it was oval shape, purple, and leaving a purple contrail when it traveled in both directions.  it was viewed to the east, moving to the west and leaving to the east. the entire sighting lasted 15-20 seconds and he lost sight of the object when it moved behind trees.
content.summary: Purple oval object with purple contrail slowly moved across the sky, stopped and changed direction leaving very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my backyard (carlsbad, ca) and a very interesting flying object caught my eye to the south (off coast heading inland).  i estimate it was about 20 miles away, about 3 miles in altitude and flying fast (much faster than other aircraft in the sky).  it had a very large red light or orb with two large arching spans of light/contrail in the shape of a fan trailing behind. the edges of the fan/arch had different colors and the interior of the fan was white.  i observed it for about 7 seconds and then it completely disappeared; reappearing after a few seconds ��� for another 4-5 seconds before it was gone.  the sky was clear - no clouds/fog.  i could see stars and other aircraft.  when i first saw i didn't think it was a meteor, it didn't look like a plane, maybe a rocket having problems?  it was not a helicopter or typical plane.   

 

just thought i���d pass it along to see if anyone else out there saw it!
content.summary: Large red sphere with very large light/comtrail arching to left and right.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my car to get my backpack and laptop, and looked up to the sky as i usually do.  there were 3 lights in the shape of an equilateral triangle which seemed to be at a reasonable altitude, no noise, went flying north from the south at a fairly decent speed.  it was not rotating.  i lost sight of it because of light pollution toward the capitol building.  (i am in memory grove a little bit southeast of the capitol building.)  there were other planes flying near the flight path of the triangular lights, but were at lower altitudes.  also, i was not able to visually see any kind of ship, only the lights.  i was not able to determine if it blacked out stars behind it because of the light pollution and also because i was in sheer awe of what i was seeing.
content.summary: Triangular lights float across sky

content.detailedDescription:
It started sometime between my birthday (11/22) and thanksgiving (11/26).  i was sitting with my father on my couch watching tv and my husband was on the computer playing world of warcraft. it was approximately 6 pm.  we live in an attic apartment, so the windows are low to the ground. i remember looking to my left and seeing three strange looking lights in the far distance from the window. they were brighter than stars, making it impossible to not notice.  my initial thought was ufos, i've always believed in their existence. my father was positive they were airplanes and my husband really didnt care. that was when i grabbed my video camera and the first tape i could find, rewound the last three minutes (i was afraid to miss them, so thats why i only rewound that little of time on the tape) and filmed the lights until the tape ended. the lights would pulsate very lightly from extremely bright to extremely dull, as well as move in a triangular conveyor belt motion.  they also would change from three lights to four, to five, back to three, etc. the lights were visible until the early morning hours, roughly 3ish is when we usually go to sleep and i can remember them still being there.

the next day, my husband went out with his father and thought to mention it to him, since my father-in-law is a valet at the newark airport.  he told my husband that the lights were visible from the airport, but they werent able to identify them. he also told my husband that fema and the military had been called to the airport because of these strange lights. the lights appeared the exact same way that night, this time i watched them until 5 am, sporatically filming them on the same tape. this was the first time i was able to see their departure, which almost resembled a lightbulb going out.  some of the lights would disappear behind some trees that were obstructing my view.  this occured every night until we left for our honeymoon in january, which strangely, the person who was watching our apartment said he didnt' see the lights at all during the week we were gone.

on christmas eve, the lights were out during the day, roughly 4pm, and i grabbed my camera and started filming. this is when i was actually able to capture several shapes on film because it was still daylight. there were two distinct objects i captured on film. one looks like a shiny metal sphere floating in the sky. the second is actually saucer shaped with two bright lights coming from the center of the craft. when i first saw these shapes, i started freaking out and called my husband over so he could see them too.  i filmed the lights late into the night. this was also the first night i noticed one of the lights release a much smaller red light that shot out of the center light and disappeared to the left (my right) of the craft.  by the time we left for our honeymoon, i had an entire tape filled with footage, and i gave it to my friend so he could make the footage an .Avi file for me. my camera is an older model, so its not usb compatable. 

after we got back, the lights would appear for a few days and disappear for a few days, always hovering in the same location and repeating the same actions.  about a month ago, the lights stopped coming. it wasn't until three nights ago that they appeared again. i thought it was strange because for a while they were scaring me so i wished they would go away, and three nights ago, i mentioned to my husband that i kind of missed seeing them, and literally 30 min to an hour later, they were out and have been ever since. the lights still behave in the same way, with the pulsating light and in the conveyor belt motion.  also to note, when they're out, you can always see airplanes  flying much higher than these lights, or in strange directions that you wouldn't see planes normally fly.

the videos im attaching were the most intriguing parts of my footage dressed up using windows movie maker for youtube. the original file from the tape is 58 minutes long. email me if you are interested in seeing the whole thing.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Strange lights that are visible from my attic apartment

content.detailedDescription: As my husband was driving down the street, i(passenger seat) took a random picture with my new camera. i'm learning the manual settings so i am always practicing. i rolled down the window and snapped at nothing in particular. i checked my lighting and focusing in the camera and saw this white object. i quickly scanned the sky where i had just shot and there was nothing there except one wispy faint cloud. i took another picture about a minute later in case something was stuck on the lens. it was clear. my son thinks it is a refractory something having to do with the camera. my sister wanted me to send this in, even though i am quite skeptical of all ufo stories.
content.summary: Showed up on a picture i took

content.detailedDescription:
ufo prob?  fbi?  or cia?
                                           27 aug 08
  i was leaving work around 12:25 pm, 27 aug 08, ellington fld, houston, tx-- i was going home to evacuating from hurricane gustav.
 i notice the object, as i was at the top of i-45 over pass going south towards pearland, tx.  i slowed down to get a closer looked at this object- it was suspended 12��� to 14��� above dixie farm rd.  i looked for cables or something that it could be hanging from, but nothing, it was stationary in sky on its own.  i drove under it and kept going.  i looked in my rear view mirror and it was still there, i know, i was not the only one that saw this object. the sky was clear ������blue bird day���, something came over me- (traumatized), i carry a camera with me all the time, which, i use with my job.  it���s funny; i never thought about stopping and calling 911 or take a photo of the object. 
   when, i first saw this object, it looked like a surveillance probe; cylinder with dark windows around the top, the object was 4 to 5 feet in length, approx 12inches in diameter.    i heard about ufo probes before, when, i got home i told my wife about what i had saw.   the sky was so clear it would have made a great clear photo��� i called my brother-n-law and told him what i had seen.   he said he saw something like this on discovery channel... that the fbi and cia...Might have���
  the object was stationary in a vertical stance and never moved-no noise- cylinder with dark windows around the top, the object was 3 to 4 feet in length, approx 12  inches in diameter.  this photo is the area where the probe was seen and the photo of the probe is one that i made on photo-shop to show what i saw.  this is not the original photo of the probe���but it is of the location.
content.summary: Ufo probe

content.detailedDescription: Phone please
content.summary: Love too but i had a stroke and can't type good enough....Sorry

I tired to send pics but i see there was a virus. funny how it was from a cell phone to my t mobile account pics, oh by the way i had to send it to my album cause it would not go to direct to my pics from phone. i wonder if they are watching me? anyway here is the pics again, i tried to re send them from another way i hope it works without a virus. 
*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: Chemtrails

content.detailedDescription:
My first sighting took place on a mild autumn evening in october of 1982 in taft, calif. taft is located approximately 40 miles southwest of bakersfield. it was dusk and there was a football game going on over at the taft high school football field. i was visiting with my dear friend and landlady mrs. pearl at the time.  i had recently got off from work and we were snacking while playing a game of cards in her living room.

as we played cards, we played some low music on her record player and i really wasn't paying any attention to the background noise of the airplane buzzing over the high school football field a block and a half away. the grand stands sounded fairly filled with spectators at this game- so, i don't know how she heard the announcement over the school's pa system that the local paragliding team were about to land on the high school football field during the halftime rah rah. the high school was a block from our residence, with two rows of mostly modest single story clapboard bungalow houses that are between us and taft union high school campus. 

upon hearing the announcement, mrs. pearl said "let's go out and see the skydivers' show during halftime!" i was a bit reluctant because i really didn't think that was such a big deal- i never was much of a fan of anything related to football, either.  we went out to the front yard and we both watched as the airplane circled over the taft high football field when mrs. pearl asked me "did you see something fly by?"  i didn't really catch view of anything except some motion out of the corner of my eye because i was focused on the circling airplane over the high school stadium at the time but, i shrugged it off responding with something like "maybe you saw a flock of birds?". i was thinking that i had caught something just out of the corner of my eye, but i wasn't sure. although i don't recall seeing anything, i followed with the explanation that "flocks of birds will sometimes fly in a v formation". 

we continued to watch as the plane as it circled above the football field with the stadium lights on, the sounds of the high school marching band playing, and stadium bleachers filled with spectators. i recall thinking it was taking quite a while for this show to start when we both suddenly caught sight of an extraordinary object consisting of 5 round neon green circles flying in a v formation, silently from west to east. it's size was about 50 feet across and was gliding silently about 100 feet (or less) above the rooftops of the houses directly across the street from where we were standing and facing. we watched until it quickly disappeared as it headed east in the direction towards bakersfield.

our jaws literally dropped open in disbelief. my landlady immediately grabbed for my arm in apparent shock as we watched this object return. now, traveling parallel to it's previous flight path, quickly disappearing into the amber colored haze in the west.
we didn't even have time to compose our thoughts before it returned again, flying closer to us each time, gliding in the opposite direction, now banking slightly northeast towards bakersfield.

it's appearance was unconventional in every way: when viewed from the side it looked to be only several inches thick (if even that), incredibly thin in fact, not having any kind of fuselage or capsule present that could contain even the smallest human being; no sign of external metal casing, no landing gear, no engines or their sounds, and from our perspective when appearing straight from behind it was like watching a long, thin, green, neon tube in the sky.

as it banked slightly northeast it appeared as a thin slit of luminescent chartreuse or a bright lime green. almost similar in color to a green traffic light and at least as vibrant in luminescence as a traffic light. we watched as it flew away disappearing into a mostly clear sky with a full moon rising and a few patches of clouds. we could only look in disbelief at each other shaking our heads, saying to each other "what the hell was that?!" seemed like only a quick moment had passed when this same formation returned again, flying at about the same low altitude overhead in the opposite direction now, towards the west. it's flight path having moved the length of it's own width south with each passing. it's span was at least the width of lucard street as it passed overhead while we stood in front of my landlady's house. 

in hindsight, it could have also appeared as though it might have been conducting a scanning of the area, because of the way that it appeared to be methodically panning back and forth (traveling from east to west in our first visual contact, then returning traveling from west to east).  with each passing it was also moving parallel and south, at least it's own width, to it's own previous flight pattern.

by now the paragliders had obviously started their own descent onto the football field and we could hear the crowds in the stands cheering them on as their smoking red flares left their trails behind them in the dusk of the early evening sky. 

during this object's last observable pass from us, we were standing underneath this craft as it flew over us standing in mrs. pearl's front yard. i would describe it as a transparent molecular structure within these five precise lime green circles, which flew evenly spaced and in unison, as if it were one craft. though from our close vantage point did not appear to be connected to each other in any visible way. the insides of the luminescent neon lime green circles appeared to be of a kinetic nature, or even electrically charged in appearance. to use a an analogy: it's observable structure reminded me of active cellular structures when viewed through a microscope.

at this last overhead fly over, my land lady in a state of panic, ran into the house and immediately called the local police station to make a report. after which she then contacted our local airport to make another report, wanting to alert a controller there of her sighting and asked if he would inquire whether the pilots or paragliders had also witnessed anything during their performance flight over the high school. needless to say that the response from both parties she contacted were humorously quick, if not ridiculing, to dismiss her concern about the incident. i responded at her attempts to explain to authorities with a smug "mrs. pearl, they don't care about what we saw and i wouldn't have bothered with that process, myself". nevertheless, she was compelled to alert the authorities while i was personally offended at how she was regarded by those very same authorities. 

personally, i didn't care if anyone in authority ever knew or even heard about the incident because i feared the potential ridicule. i knew that we had witnessed something extremely unique and at the same time completely unnerving. we were both really startled by the close range of the sighting we had witnessed over the course of about 7 minutes, perhaps 10 at most.

during the very short telephone reports that mrs. pearl attempted to make with the local authorities and judging her reaction from their attitudes towards her by about her report, i could see that their response was to disregard the incident as a joke, or dismiss her as being intoxicated, which made her feel vulnerably insecure about what we both witnessed. we certainly weren't any of those things. 

it's a strange feeling to have the same authorities who are supposed to protect and to serve you, not believe you when you are notifying them of something out of the ordinary. i wouldn't have bothered with reporting anything to any of these local agencies in the first place and i told her that i was not surprised by their attitude. the airport ended the conversation with mrs. pearl by telling her that they would contact us should there be any further eyewitness reports, or after conferring with the pilots in the air, i believe. "right" i thought. interestingly however, that this object was actually flying somewhere between the ground and the airplane above the high school that was carrying these parachutist's. pilots and paragliders you would have thought might have possibly observed something during their descent towards the field. what about the pilots? was it also observed by anyone attending the high school football stadium or field that night? i really don't know. i have no question in my own mind that we witnessed something from another dimension of reality altogether because of it's extraordinary look and behavior. i wonder had we not run inside to make the report would we have possibly witnessed more fly by's? 

in an unfortunate and seemingly unrelated incident after this event, coincidentally involving the same aircraft that was carrying the same pilots and the same team of taft's paraglider's that we observed performing on that october evening in taft, california, a disaster was also to occur about a week or so after our ufo sighting:

(taken from a report i discovered that was released about findings urging ntsb/faa regulations regarding sport parachuting and flying safety):




on october 17, 1982, a military version of a beech d-18 crashed during takeoff near taft, california. the aircraft had 12 sport parachutists on board; none survived. the safety board determined that the airplane had been overloaded with a center of gravity that was well in excess of the aft limit. the board was concerned that the faa was not sufficiently attentive to sport parachuting operations and that the safety of parachutists was jeopardized by companies that didn't operate their airplanes safely. the safety board urged the faa to do a better job of defining its oversight responsibilities for sport parachute aircraft.
content.summary: Molecular, luminescent lime green, v shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Following the report of numerous star-like objects during aurora borealis on the 12th, at dawn (5:05 am) a close encounter with a diamond/star-like object flew over the city.

it was heading south east. it's a wonder if anyone else noticed it or how competent the local military installation's personnel or are informed on these matters. it wouldn't surprise me if it was one of ours.
content.summary: Following the report of numerous star-like objects, at dawn a close encounter with a diamond/star-like object flew over the city

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south into the town, heading to the grocery store when i noticed a couple of red lights in the sky.  my first impression was that they were the beacon lights on some radio towers, but i knew that there were no towers where the lights were.  i slowed down to look closer and realized that there were three lights forming a triangle and they were slowly moving north.  my second thought was that they were fire kites  by this time, the lights were almost overhead, but off to my left.  then i noticed another set of lights directly behind the first and in the exact same triangle formation.  the ligts appeared to be 300 to 400 feet in the air and the shape they made about 100' long and 35-40 feet across at the back (base) of the triangle.  i pulled to the shoulder of the street and rolled down my window, but could not hear anything.  i decided to move up to a parking lot and get out.  as i turned into the parking lot, i noticed a third set of lights directly behind the second - the same size and shape and moving in the same direction.  i have never seen fire kites maintain such a tight formation and move at exactly the same speed.

from my truck, i saw all three lights from almost head on.  the triangle form was very clear.  after i pulled into the parking lot, my viewing angle made the triangles flatten out - telling me they were not very high up.  i grabbed my cell phone, ran to clear area and took a quick video of the third set of lights.  unfortunately, the video quality is poor, the lights appear to blink and go in and out of view.  these lights stayed consistent orangish red color, never blinked and never made a noise.

i have attached the video taken directly off my phone.  in the frame, there are two telephone posts.  at the beginning, the lead light of the object is just to the left of the right post, about halfway up.  the trailing lights are just below the flare from the street light.  the lights will move between the two posts, the lead light almost in line with the top of the second post.  the angle makes the trailing lights almost appear as one, but the angle i first saw them at showed a good distance seperating them.  there is another light dancing in the middle of the shot - this is a flare from something on the camera lense.  the three light can be seen obviously moving.  cars go by oblivious to what i am watching.

i did not think i was getting any video, so i quit shooting.  immediately after i turned the camera off, i heard someone behind me exclaim "oh my god".  the parking lot i stopped in was the vfw hall and someone came out to see why i had jumped out of my truck leaving the door wide open. two people from the hall also witnessed the lights, but i did not get there names.

i am not someone who is quick to lable something supernatural, but i do not have an explanation for these lights.  i was in awe when i saw them, then schocked.  i thought about getting back in my truck and following them for a while, but then i thought i was being silly and just went on to the grocery store. 

i posted the video on facebook that evening, but immediately pulled it down for fear of ridicule.  i know what i saw, but it's hard to get others to believe it.
content.summary: Three large triangular shaped objects moving north in a line

content.detailedDescription: Noticed flashing colors behind the house as we were walking up the driveway walked to te back yard to see an object with flashing lights in the distance. watched the object for 40 minutes as it moved slowley from right to left. at times it seemed to have a line of the lights on either side of oe main bright light in the center. we watched several planes pass over this object and it slowly moved away from our area as if it was turning around to head in another direction. there was no sound coming from this object and a friend came to te house to witness this object. we were all surprised at what we were looking at and amazed at the same time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple colors of light flashing( green, purple,orange, blue, red)  with object hovering moving slowly at times

content.detailedDescription:
april 13th 2011, 11:38pm. i was driving down the carlisle pike to my friends house, right as i was about to pass my high school (cumberland valley high school) i looked up at the moon which was just about exit from passing behind large cloud coverage. right as i was about to see the moon i saw a huge blue flash that looked like it fell to the clouds and dissapeared. the flash was light blue in color and was only visible for about a second but since i was already looking up at the moon i saw the entire event. right after i saw the flash i text messaged my friend who's house i was on my way to. (this is why i know the exact time that the event happened cause i checked the time i sent the text message before i wrote this report)

i've seen "ufo's" before but i've only ever reported one before this. this is because i won't report anything unless i am positive i cannot explain what happened. 

contact me for more information. thank you.
content.summary: Falling blue glow that flashed really big and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
We were closing up the house for the night. it was beautiful outside nice and bright from the moon and the stars were very brillant as it was so clear out. so, i decided to step on out and look at the very brilliant night as i so often do. its warmer and no wind blowing so i scanned the sky and immediately noticed the 3 star like objects lined up... that are never there any other evening. i was looking westward and slighty up. i called to my mother and fiancee to look at the stars. not mentioning what "i" am visualizing and thinking. right away my mom picked up on those "new stars" over the field west of us. my fiancee was having a hard time admitting what his eyes were telling him at first and then at the same time my mother and i said," look the one on the left is raising up!"  it was clear then that they were all kinda hovering and moving closer to each other then back apart. sometimes going higher or lower than each other. not blinking, not colored but steady bright white lights just a little different shade than the stars, a little brighter. they were close compared to the stars as well. its a guess but am thinking they were 2000 ft up. maybe 200 ft apart at times. we watched over a steady 15 min. period. i would go do other things and come back and check on them. after 25 min. had passed since i first noticed them, they were gone. yet all the other stars in the sky were unmoved. i know what we seen and i have to admit after having another more terrifying "sighting" a couple of years ago with other witnesses, i am disturbed. for one the sighting is in the exact same place within a mile of the other incident. two we have heard strange things in the night, not explainable. last but not least third to have witnessed such an event more than once in a lifetime is just shocking! why are they here, just watching us? the three of us are sure without uncertianity that we are not alone here on earth!!!
i never reported to mufon what happened to us two summers ago for i was unaware of mufon, but i am willing to speak with someone about that incident.
content.summary: Three star like lights lined up perfectly in the western sky.  the wobbled to and fro. the lights were on steady but seemed to be twirling.

content.detailedDescription: my wife and  i were headed west on hwy. 11 in tulsa,oklahoma at 11:50am about 6 miles north of downtown tulsa.  i saw thru my windhield at about 11-12 o'clock high into a clear blue sky something oval to almost round shaped with like 2 very very  bright lights inside the shape. it seemed to be a shiny metallic outside the lights.   my wife saw it about the same time.  at first i thought it might be a bright reflection on windshield from the sun but the sun was behind the car over my left shoulder.  the object was moving to n/w direction.  after driving 2 miles watching the object we turned to north on hwy. 75 to go to an appointment in bartlesville. the object had started loosing the 2 bright lights and seemed to change to dull gray color and shaped like a cigar or missle shaped. it seemed to sort of fade away briefly.  after heading north on hwy. 75 for about 15 seconds  we could still see it but it faded away again. after a few seconds it appeared again from lower in west sky and accelerated up at about a 20 degree angle going north/west  direction still dull gray in color cigar shaped with like a rudder on the back of it. we watch it for about a mile down the hwy. headed north and it just faded away or disappeared. we should have been able to see it in the blue sky for quite a ways with the weather conditions but it just vanished. really weird and we'll never forget it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: About 6 miles north of tulsa very bright at about 11 o'clock in sky  moving n/w  up and down and changing shape & disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
1) yo estava en la calle me dirijia a mi casa.
2)llame a un amigo y le dije que saliera a ver un ovni.
3)el objeto parecia un platillo y note que estava flotando despues comenzo a osilar.
4)era un platillo alargado como un ovalo tenia sombra en la parte inferior y giraba en todas las direcciones subitamente comenzo a decender y a acender.
5)yo me senti tranquilo pero no lo podia creer , llame a un amigo y espere a que desapareciera.
6)el objeto se escondio detras de un edificio y comenzo a decender..No lo volvi a ver. pero decendia a una velocidad de 7 km/h.

me gustaria que vieran el video y lo estudiaran...Afortunadamente muchas personas lo vieron y dos de ellas lo publicaron en la red. el primer video es lo que yo vi exactamente.
por favor solo veanlo y analizen yo creo que uds me pueden decir si es o no es un ovni..Muchas gracias saludos desde colombia bogota.

escribo el link de la persona que lo grabo.

*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Vi un ovni claramente  con un amigo sobre bogota el objeto giraba y daba vueltas.

content.detailedDescription:
On 4/11/11 about 11:00-11:30 p.M. my entire family witnessed two unknown objects about 200 ft above the tree lines coming in from the ne and flying sw.  neither object made any noise.  we had been watching the night sky observing different lights when suddenly out of nowhere from the ne, we saw a very odd shaped object flashing red/blue lights.  then from a more northern direction was a "plane-like" craft seemingly following the first object at about 3/4 mile behind.  if you were not outside observing these two objects flying overhead you would have never known they had flown over.  neither object made any noise.  they were both flying about 50-60 mph.  the second craft appeared to be in the shape of a triangle and had two amber large circle tail lights on either end of the craft.  the tail "lights" were very far apart. 

i believe that what we saw here in lansing is the same thing that the person in fenton reported seeing.  we were also all very shocked and could not figure out what we were looking at.  

the first object that was flashing the red/blue lights, i can't even explain the shape, it looked like the bottom object had a second object stacked on top as if it was carrying something.

both objects continued flying southwest and eventually flew out of our sight.
content.summary: Two unexplained flying crafts

content.detailedDescription:
On april 8th, 2011, at approximately 02:00 hours, i was working outdoors near the intersection of centre st and dunlop rd in delta, bc. after completing a task at a nearby park, i got into my car and began to drive eastbound on dunlop rd towards terrace dr. 

the sky was clear and stars were visible overhead. my eyes were drawn to numerous orange coloured lights in a "v" pattern flying in a northerly direction towards the river. there were approximately 11 orange coloured lights that outlined the "v" shape. 

i immediately pulled my car over and got out to look at the object more closely. i have worked a lot of night shifts over the years, and i have never seen any aircraft lit up like this before. 

as i looked up at it, it continued to fly north towards the river. it appeared to be quite large, and no sound could be heard from it. i would describe its speed as "leisurely" as it did not appear to be going fast or slow. 

i watched for a short while as the object continued north. my observation of the object was eventually blocked by a tree line as it continued north. i was able to move closer to the trees and view between them, and i watched as it continued north. it did not appear to be descending or ascending. 

it could very well have been a plane of some sort, but like i said, in all of my years working night shifts i have never seen an aircraft quite like that or even lit up like the way it was lit up. 

i did not have the opportunity to photograph or videotape the object.
content.summary: Boomerang w/ orange lights (approx 11 lights) across entire front.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking counterclockwise on the track at local park between 3pm and 3:45 pm. walking e to ene i happened to look up at the sky and saw a small bright multicolored object in the sky. i was wearing polarized sunglasses at the time and object was still visible without them on but image was not as crisp. the object really didn't have any particular shape and was moving n to s very slowly. i did see a jet at altitude near it displaying a contrail and this object moved beneath the contrail. very hard to gauge distance for the sky was utterly clear and very blue. there was a 5-10 mph wind blowing from the north so i presumed it was a lost mylar balloon or some kind of reflective debris. it randomly flashed red, blue, yellow, green and silver as if glinting in the sun.

i finished my walk and moved my car near a bench on the west side of the walking track that i could rest on and the bench was facing ese. the moon was rising in front of me on the tree line across the park. thinking about what i had seen i looked up at the sky again and was watching jets plow across the sky when i saw another object but this was ball shaped and solid white. it too was moving roughly n to s at a very slow pace and i could not determine how high up it was, greater than 1000' no doubt but i had no frame of reference in the sky to compare it to. certainly lower than planes that were producing contrails this day. it lazily tracked on a straight line when i saw another pair of white objects downrange from the first one. these appeared somewhat stationary. the first single object moved into the area of the pair and i lost track of them due to distance and glare. 

my wife called me and i was telling her this nutty story when i noticed nearly directly above me another of the flashing multicolored objects. this one was at about the same distance and was moving ne to sw i lost track of it when it moved behind the branches of a tree behind me.

it was 70 deg. with a light n to s wind with the mid afternoon sun to my back. there were plenty of other people at the park but no one else seemed to pay any attention to these things. they didn't exhibit any non ballistic behavior other than the very slow rate of speed. much slower than the many aircraft in the sky at the time. 

these without a doubt could be trash or balloons or something similar. the odd thing was the number of then in such a short period of time. i would expect to maybe look up and see a single object and be satisfied and write it off as a balloon but to see 5 of them and traveling in different directions in a 45 min period was a bit too odd for me.
content.summary: Mixture of mutlicolored and solid white objects in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my back yard in lexington when i happened to look up towards the south east and a white flash caught my eye. could not tell what it was but it was white in color and what looked to be flashing  (this is in full sunlight) i then noticed off to its left a second object of similar size and activity to the right of it. i observed this for about 2 minutes  while i had one of my sons grab my camera. within about a minute or so the 2 objects got closer together and were side by side both still flashing white. (possibly a tumbling motion) 

my son not finding my camera forced me to go in the house and get it. figuring on the speed they were moving they would be in front of the house when i got back outside i went out front only to find 1 of the 2 objects more to the east now where i snapped a few photos before i lost sight of it behind the trees about a half mile away.
content.summary: Frisbee like

content.detailedDescription: I was in fenton, mi were i live currently. i was letting my dog out, and had to run out to my car for something. as soon as i opened the back door i noticed a bright flashing light to the ne direction(back porch faces north). as i looked closely and said to myself, "what the hell is that", i noticed there were blue and red lights flashing, almost like a strobe light. i immediately started to think of logical explanations, because afterall it was pretty obvious and visible to anyone who would look in its direction. i went to my car, got my stuff, and came back to the backyard. the light was still there. so i watched, thinking that eventualy it would make sense. i noticed that it was moving slightly. not fast, almost like a helicopter maybe. it went left, right, up, down, higher and lower, but stayed in the same general area and distance for at least 3 hours. the size or brightness of the light did not change much durring this time, thats why i say it stayed in same general area and distance. the way i know it was actually moving around, rather than my eyes playing tricks on me, was caause i had a treeline (a little mini woods)right in my yard were the light was. i watched the light move above the tree line, when i could see it clearly, and below the tree line were it would b hard to see as well because of branches blocking my view. i also watched it move from behind one tree to another, left and right. these were thick trees that didnt move to much with winds, the light was moving behind the trees. note: it wasnt the the trees blowing back and forth that made the light move, the light was moving,slowly. durring about the first 20 minutes of me watching this light, i noticed and heard a plane fly over my house,pretty high up, normal height for a plane, going towards the direction of the light. it didnt look like a comercial plane, but im not sure. about 10 minutes after that, a loud, low helicopter took off in the same direction, and basically flew slow, wide circles of the area. i didnt really see it after that (the helicopter, but could still hear it here and there and catch a glimpse of its lights in the distance. i kept stareing at anything i could see or hear. i just started to take notice of everything going on in the sky. i turned around, now facing west or northwest, and i seen, what i would say looks like a small plane in the dark, flying only a couple hundred feet high. no noise at all! it was honestly the lowest flying plane ive ever seen. if i had a baseball, i coulda probaly hit it with it. it had big bright yellowish lights acroos the whole side that i seen. thats why i say looked like a plane. i really freaked me out, as i watched it glide slowly and sliently across the sky. if i had to guess it was probaly traveling about 60 mph, give or take a few. eventually it flew out of my vision behind a tree line (a different tree line). all i could hear the whole time was a car on the road here and there, and alot of dogs barking. there is an airport in flint, but it was at least 10 to 15 miles away from were i seen this. my friend lives across the street from it, and when a plane takes off or lands, its really loud and shakes the house pretty much, so i know that the object not making any noise was unusual, especialy bein that low. after that, other than the light in the sky i was watching, there wasnt anything else in the air flying the whole time. after watching the original light for a total of 2 hours, as it hovered around bak n forth, i decided to go inside at about 1230 am. i couldnt just forget about it, so i found a window that had a view of it and watched it for another hour. it actually started to come a little closer to my houses area at one point, but took its time. at about 2 i decided to call it a night, but it was still there when i left it.  conclusion: it could of been helicopter, thats what i originally thought, but a helicopter staying and hovering in one general area for 3 hours, without any noise, doesnt seem likely. but idk? as far as the low silent flying object to my west, i think it coulda been a plane, but it was silent and really really really low. im a pretty down to earth, logical dude, but last night made me question myself, cause i could not find anything logical about the light to my east. btw, i tryed to take pics and video, but my camera sux and my phone camera sux even worse. as
content.summary: Red and blue -ish flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I'm not a great writer to bare with me. i was walking home from a local 24hr sheetz gas station with my at the time 14 year old son. i was pointing out an object to the north that was not a star that had a strobe effect. he thought it was a helicopter cause the object was stationary. after returning home, i wanted someone else to see what i was seeing. i reluctantly called 911 to report it. the said they would send out a car. clouds covered the object two minutes before the first officer arrived. i explained to him i was not drinking and told him my story thus far. then a second object appeared in the eastern sky. it was a pale orange sphere that would grow fifteen times bigger with in a fraction of a second. he radioed another car and more officers showed up. this went on for 45 minutes to an hour. when all was said and done there was eight cars and twelve officers. this was never in the paper or the local news. the officers were freaking out cause they didn't know what it was. there response was "swamp gas", "light refracted off of venus." then they said "you can call us again, but there is nothing we can do about it." they also got several photos possibly video as well.
content.summary: Ufo witnessed with twelve on-duty state college police officers

content.detailedDescription:
This is re: mufon cases #23924 and #24031

i had no idea how to report a ufo sighting and wasn't even interested. but then i googled wrightsville beach ufo and saw that you had a case report from the same night i saw what i saw. i felt i should chime in. 

in both cases, the yacht club members and the couple, they were both further away then i was. the yacht club is about a mile from the pier, and the pier is a few hundred yards away from where i was. 

i was out for a run on the beach and i saw a triangular object rise out of the ocean maybe 150-200 feet away from my spot on the beach. i was scared so i did not approach. it was a pretty dark night, but some stars were out. i could tell it was a solid object because when they orange/red lights in a triangular pattern rose from the water, the space in between the lights blocked out the stars behind it, indicating to me it was a solid object. 

the object hovered about 50 feet above the water for maybe 10-15 seconds, and then shot off horizontally, then upwards from a dead-stand-still to incredible speeds with no sounds of engine thrust. 

i walked further down the beach and saw the lights again behind me, over my right shoulder. i saw them for less time, maybe because i had missed them start again, or maybe the duration was simply shorter. i can't much speak to the 2nd incident. i was trying to get down to the end of the beach. 

no later than 10 minutes later, fighter jets began to fly overhead, and i could hear at least one helicopter. i thought they were looking for whatever i saw. that was my gut reaction. 

i know you have no reason to believe this almost a year later, but this is what i saw. i will never forget that night, and it was a very scary experience. i want to try to not attach emotions to the report, and i don't want to say it was alien, but it was unidentfied, it was submerged, it flew, and i cannot say what it was. that's a ufo/uso to me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Wilmington, wrightsville beach

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to my house on rt316 leightersburg rd just at the maryland pennsylvania state line after visiting my parents and was on the phone with a friend and my line started to get static and i was complaining about it to her and then i noticed a bright light out of the corner of my left eye. it side view was tall as a bill board and glowing bright white. it then rotated slightly while still in the same place and i could now see it had a triangular shape with the other side having red and white light constant glow nothing was blinking i put the windows down and heard no noise at all. the object was on the left side of the street with myself facing twards the maryland state side. it then started moving crossing the street and heading to the right of the road i was frozen as it was distancing it finally dawned on me to take a photo with my phone i was shaking a little but rested my arm on each other as i would my rifle  when i was in the military. as i took the picture it sped up till i could no longer see it over the tree line. i have had problems sleeping ever since this occurance.
content.summary: I saw a thick triangle with red and white light, i slowed to a stop saw it wasnt moving. then started moving very slow was as big as a two story house. crossed the street speeding up no sound then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
What i saw last night i saw 4 years ago in the antelope valley, ca. it was sitting there hovering like a helicopter but with no propellers of any sort, just a few yards off of the 14 freeway, maybe about 100 to 150 feet in the air. it had the brightest lights on each triangle corner (like white spot lights).  when we got closer to it we could see underneath had a triangular cavity that had lights running all along the sides of the cavity. we took the next off ramp to turn around and get a longer look at it but when we got back on the freeway the object in the sky was gone. if it had been any type of plane or helicopter we would still have been able to see it in motion as it was leaving the area. the speed in which this thing disappeared was not any type of technology that is of this earth, that���s for sure. there was no sound that we heard coming from this object nor was the dirt on the ground below being disturbed in any way.

what i saw last night, april 12, 2011 which again was in the antelope valley, ca had the same very bright lights on each corner defining it as being a triangular shape. i did not see lights lining an underneath cavity this time around. we were parked while the triangle shaped object moved closer to us. just as it reached the point of being right in front of us, it changed direction in a split second. no airplane or helicopter can change direction like that without having to swoop around first so we knew this was not an ordinary earthly object. just after changing direction it shot off at what i would say was light speed and disappeared into thin air. again there was no sound that i heard even though the object was very low and not too far away from where we were parked. without a doubt i know i saw a ufo for the second time, amazing, truly amazing!!
content.summary: Triangle shape ufo with 3 bright lights spotted in so ca high desert

content.detailedDescription: I posted some of this last nite.Well i went through them again tonight because i caught so many pictures/images...And was so excited, (it was by far the most unreal event i've pretty much ever witnessed!!) and i should have tried to list them as they started arriving and departing... it was the most action in a long...Long time!!! it started at 11:30pm and it continued up until 2am at which time i went to bed and couldn't continue watching anymore...Bcuz i was gonna pass out...Ok so its monday night its pouring rain...Cold and nobody that i know of is taking a helicopter tour over manhattan on a night like that. and it isn't any airplane, besides the fact that after 911 planes are restricted over nyc.. and i have pictures of lights that appear on the water as well..... just watch these cams especially cam 3 and cam 4...You wont believe the things you will see my friend contact my email through the web page and ill send you pictures that will make you say...Whats going on ???
content.shape: Cigar,   Cone,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Nyc red ufo ??...Real???.... i'd say so !!!

content.detailedDescription:
Monday night about 11:45pm��� 04/11/2011 skiatook, oklahoma.. 
i was out walking our dog and looking at the very clear night sky��� we were walking out in an open field away from a lot of light and i was thinking how clear the sky was��� 

i saw 2 very bright lights moving towards me from the south east.  it seemed to be moving slow��� it took about 5 min for the lights to get over head and that was when i could see this object was triangle shaped with 3 lights on the corners with dimmer lights on the leading edge.  if i had to guess i would say that the object was moving about 50 to 70 miles an hour with no sound. also i would guess that is was  between 500 to 700 feet in the air and if you would hold a playing card out at arm���s length  it was about that big looking at the card short side to short side..  i could not see the craft it���s self and could only see the lights.  however as it went over head it blocked out the stars.  as it moved to the north west��� the lights on the corners did not seem as bright and it only took a few min. for the object to move far enough away that i could not see the lights any more.   i could not hear any noise coming from the object at all and it stayed on the same course the whole time i saw it��� 

the whole time my dog was running around at the end of her long leash exploring clumps of grass and did not seem aware of anything strange going on��� we were about 2 blocks from the highway and the whole time i could still hear the noise of the traffic. 
 
i did not have any strange feelings as the craft passed over head and had no lost time or dizzy feelings.  to be honest, i did feel a little excited.  excited because i have read and listened to a lot of sighting stories, and at last i have had my second sighting,  the first one being back in 1976.
content.summary: I saw 2 very bright lights moving towards me from the south east.  it seemed to be moving slow…

content.detailedDescription: It was about to storm and there was an opening in the clouds above my house.  i was laying in a lazy chair in the yard and was looking up at the sky around 3:30pm. the object moved from west to east just a little above cloud height.  the object was white in color and was tumbling through the air at a high rate of speed.  there was no sound and object was moving very fast.  the object disappeared in the clouds.
content.summary: White tumbling ufo milton wv
